api_list.api_description: Returns iDigBio record format from legacy API.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the record.

optional_parameters.name: view_type
optional_parameters.description: The type of object to view.

query: Can you retrieve data for the satellite named 'Hubble'? Additionally, I need information on a specific biodiversity record from iDigBio using its UUID uuid='c5e7b8fe-7f33-404e-96cc-35a201a4b1d9'.
